root: ^Well, it doesn’t matter, now you’re stuck here too
^I’ve always lived here, since the golden age of the forest
^But during the war, I ended up, by accident, being trapped in this room…
^I dont't like to talk about it...
^It was a huge trauma for everyone
^Well, in the golden age, 3 great leaders ruled our society
^But driven by greed, a betrayal happened
